name: Vegan Caldo de Res
description: Vegan caldo de res (vegan Mexican beef soup) is a warm comforting soup of no-beef, carrots, potatoes, corn, chayote, potatoes, mint, and cilantro. It is served all year, but is especially good in the winter months.
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ cups Diced russet potato ((1 medium potato))
2 cups Large diced cabbage ((1/4  head of cabbage))

recipeInstructions.text: Set a large pot to medium-high heat (if necessary add a little bit of oil). Sear the beefless tips for 2 minutes on each side. Remove from pot and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Set a large pot to medium-high heat (if necessary add a little bit of oil). Sear the beefless tips for 2 minutes on each side. Remove from pot and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Add onion and ¼ cup of vegetable stock to deglaze the bottom of the pot. Cook onion for 4-5 minutes or until tender and translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: Add onion and ¼ cup of vegetable stock to deglaze the bottom of the pot. Cook onion for 4-5 minutes or until tender and translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add garlic and cook for 1 more minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in vegetable stock and add the mint and cilantro.
recipeInstructions.name: Pour in vegetable stock and add the mint and cilantro.

recipeInstructions.text: Bring to slow simmer and add the corn, carrots, and potatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring to slow simmer and add the corn, carrots, and potatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer for 6 minutes and then add the chayote, zucchini, and cabbage.
recipeInstructions.name: Simmer for 6 minutes and then add the chayote, zucchini, and cabbage.

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer for 8- 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Simmer for 8- 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the beefless tips in half, and add about 1/3 cup to each bowl. Pour soup on top and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the beefless tips in half, and add about 1/3 cup to each bowl. Pour soup on top and serve.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with lime wedges and warm tortillas.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with lime wedges and warm tortillas.

keywords: vegan beef stew, vegan caldo de res
